Articles.Content:
**Kerbstone - Moho 7**

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2KNu0iuhDCM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

What doy you think about me video ?
That was fun--love that you used an SRB to de-orbit!

> 
> That was fun--love that you used an SRB to de-orbit!

It was suborbital flight actually, when i once putted Bob on 250 km(AP) suborbital flight he disintegrated during reentry, so i reverted and try to use additional SRB to slowdown before re-entry. I thought it's help poor Bob stay in one piece ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> It was suborbital flight actually

De-suborbit, slow down, whatever ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
